about.details:
Incorporated in 2014, Viviana Power Tech Limited is engaged in the business of Power Transmission, Distribution and Industrial EPC space projects (Engineering, Procurement and construction). The company provide a wide range of services such as Power Transmission, EHV substation, Testing and Commissioning of sub-station and Transmission, Power Distribution Network Establishment, Underground Cable laying, Upgradation and modification of existing power system.

Viviana Power Tech has a business module to suit operational needs. Business operations mainly comprise two main tasks: Supply and service. The company owns adequate machinery but for specific requirements of machinery, The company avails services on a hire basis.

The company is an ISO 9001:2015 certified organization for Quality Management systems, ISO 14001:2015 for Environmental Management systems and OHSAS 45001:2018 for Occupational Health and Safety Management systems.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Organizational stability along with management expertise.
  • Existing client relationship.
  • Well-trained employee base.
  • Quality Assurance.

faqs.question: What is the Viviana Power Tech IPO?
faqs.answer:
Viviana Power Tech IPO is a SME IPO of 1600000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹8.80 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹55 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 5, 2022, and closes on September 8, 2022.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Viviana Power Tech IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Viviana Power Tech IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Viviana Power Tech IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Viviana Power Tech IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Viviana Power Tech IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Viviana Power Tech IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Viviana Power Tech IPO opens on September 5, 2022 and closes on September 8, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Viviana Power Tech IPO?
faqs.answer: Viviana Power Tech IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,10,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Viviana Power Tech IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Viviana Power Tech IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Viviana Power Tech IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Viviana Power Tech IPO will be done on Tuesday, September 13, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, September 15, 2022. Check the Viviana Power Tech IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Viviana Power Tech IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Viviana Power Tech IPO listing date is on Friday, September 16, 2022.
